name: Un-chained
description:
Welcome to Un-chained!

Note: This game was created for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam!

In this game you play as an adventurer, who has been chained by an evil goblin. Your mission is to break the chains you are being held with, using spikes. Platform over a variety of different levels and materials.  Escape the evil goblin, and break every single one of the chains you are being held by. Good luck!

Please give feedback if you find any bugs!
